name: telegram-mini-app
description: Telegram Mini App with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend && npm run lint:fix --prefix backend
